mapper.select: select * from orderInform where orderCode = 2 and rownum<=1
mapper.update: update menu set menuName=#{menuName}, menuContent=#{menuContent}, menuPrice=#{menuPrice} where seqMenu=#{seqMenu}

update orderInform set orderCode=5 where seqOrder=#{seqOrder}

mapper.select: select to_char(orderDate, 'YYYY') as orderDate, to_char(sum(orderPrice)) as orderPrice, storeName from orderInform a left join store b on(a.storeNum = b.storeNum) group by to_char(orderDate, 'YYYY'), storename order by storename

select to_char(orderDate, 'YY/mm') as orderDate, to_char(sum(orderPrice)) as orderPrice, storeName from orderInform a left join store b on(a.storeNum = b.storeNum) group by to_char(orderDate, 'YY/mm'), storename

select orderGroup, to_char(max(orderDate)) as orderDate, to_char(sum(orderPrice)) as orderPrice, max(menuName) as menuName, max(storeName) as storeName from orderInform a left join store b on(a.storeNum = b.storeNum) group by orderGroup order by storeName, orderGroup
